title: Tiotropium bromide
summary: Tiotropium bromide, sold under the brand name Spiriva among others, is a long-acting bronchodilator used in the management of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) and asthma.[10][11] Specifically it is used to try to prevent periods of worsening rather than for those periods themselves.[10] It is used by inhalation through the mouth.[10] Onset typically begins within half an hour and lasts for 24 hours.[10]
